text: "Stuck in a Moment You Can't Get Out Of" is a 2001 song by Irish rock group U2. It is the second track and second single from their 10th studio album All That You Can't Leave Behind and won a Grammy Award in 2002. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, Scotland, Spain and Portugal, number 3 in Australia, number 17 in New Zealand, number 12 in the Netherlands and number 1 in Italy, Ireland and Canada. ==Formats and track listings== Note * Track 4 only available on the Australian limited edition CD Note * Track 4 only available on the Australian limited edition CD Note * Only available in France Note * Released only in Japan, featuring most B-sides from both regular CD releases Note * A Canada-only release on late October 2001, also available on CD Category:2001 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:U2 songs
title: Stuck in a Moment You Can't Get Out Of
